DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study evaluation use metal stent part treatment benign biliary stricture .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Use Metal Stents Part Treatment Benign Biliary Strictures
DOC.detailed_description: In patient benign biliary stricture , use fully cover self-expandable metal stent ( SEMS ) propose alternative plastic stenting , high quality prospective data sparse . This study perform evaluate long -term effectiveness safety new fully cover SEMS benign biliary stricture .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 18 year old 2 . Subject benign biliary stricture 3 . Subject must able give informed consent 1 . Any contraindication Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) 2 . The subject unable give inform consent
